ai-patthana8.64:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.64:1.1_0: ‘One who has not subdued the teaching for the sake of non-of-existence.’ ...
ai-patthana8.64:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of rapture ...
ai-patthana8.64:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of rapture ...
ai-patthana8.64:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
